choices.answer: to grow wealthy and spread Christianity
to break the Portuguese monopoly on trade

questions.question: What was the purpose of the Treaty of Tordesillas?

choices.answer: to divide up the trade routes to the East
to decrease conflict over the claiming of new lands
promote cooperation in the sharing of technological advances

the southern tip of South America

questions.question: Which of the following did NOT aid the Spanish in conquering the Aztecs?
On what assumption was the encomienda system based?

choices.answer: Europeans had the right to demand labor from Natives
that exposure to European culture would help educate Natives
being on Spanish farms would convert Natives to Christianity
that mestizos had more rights than full-blooded Natives

questions.question: How did Bartolome de Las Casas affect race relations in the Americas?

choices.answer: wants better treatment for Natives but ok withAfrican slaves
Led an uprising against Spanish due to treatment of Natives
Started a colony in present-day Arizona based on equality
Visited the King to protest treatment of Native Americans

questions.question: What was one result of the loss of native lives to disease?

choices.answer: the ruin of several tobacco and sugar cane plantations
a growing tolerance between the colonists and the natives
fewer battles between the colonists and natives over land
a sever shortage of labor in the colonies
